---
Create .github/copilot-instructions.md for this repository.
Include: project context, preferred languages/tools, code style, testing commands, how to name branches/commits, PR expectations, and “do/don’t” rules for Copilot.
Keep it short and actionable.
If any repo-specific commands are unknown, add TODO placeholders.
